been particularly contentious in the wireless industry, which has argued that it needs the freedom to manage networks because bandwidth is limited and consumers could experience slower access or dropped service if some applications hog capacity. Opening wireless services to greater consumer choice will drive investment and innovation in the mobile marketplace, Julius Genachowski said in a statement Tuesday. Verizon Wireless chief executive Lowell McAdam said the announcement with Google had little to do with the proposed rules. The 50-year-old actress- who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the US TV show- believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. "He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. Jane Lynch also admitted she is "amazed" by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell . She explained in an interview with

Senators was written to German Foreign Minister Guido Westerwelle on February 1, before India's Finance Ministry announced its decision to pay the regime for Iranian crude oil through EIH in euros, according to Economic Times. EIH is one of Iran's few remaining access points to the European financial system, said the letter signed by Senators Frank R Lautenberg, Mike Johanns , Barbara Boxer , Bob Casey, Scott Brown, Al Franken , Kirsten Gillibrand , Mark Kirk , Jon Kyl , Sen. down over allegations of phone-hacking by the News of the World when he was the newspaper's editor. A No 10 spokeswoman told reporters at a regular briefing that a statement was being prepared. The Prime Minister has had full confidence in Mr Andy Coulson and still does, she said. The question now is what Andy Coulson has decided to do. Andy Coulson : profile Andy Coulson resigned as News of the World editor after the Clive Goodman case- but bounced back fast

a string of 355 passes without being intercepted, received 21 votes from a nationwide panel of 50 media members who regularly cover the league. He easily beat Philadelphia quarterback Michael Vick , who got 11 votes. To me it comes down to the mental toughness and determination of the players and coaches, Tom Brady said. table" in any discussions of tackling the federal deficit, Sheldon Whitehouse declared in an interview Tuesday. The Rhode Island senator has joined the Defending Social Security Caucus newly organized by fellow Democratic Sen. Bernie Sanders of Vermont. Social Security has not contributed a dime to the debt or the deficit, he said, calling the program "rock-solid for at least another 27 years."
